title: Falling for the Deputy
description: Mack Whittaker hates the spotlight. As a deputy sheriff in a small town that actually respects his privacy, it's easy to keep a low profile and do his job. So when a smart, sassy reporter rolls into town looking for a good story, Mack is immediately on guard. He'll do everything in his power to keep Chloe Atherton's attention-her intuition-focused on the department. And not on him.But it seems as if the woman will stop at nothing to get her story, even if it means digging into his past.And neither of them realizes that one byline will change more than just their careers.â€¦
author: Amy Frazier
